title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully authenticate and access the HiPat5-GPT-1 platform with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the platform login page.
Enter a valid username/email and password.
Submit the login form.
Verify that the user is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Authentication Failure
description: Verify that the system displays an error when a user attempts to log in with invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the platform login page.
Enter an invalid username/email or password.
Submit the login form.
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating authentication failure.

title: Pat AI Valid Nutrition Query Response
description: Test that the AI Chat Assistant (Pat) responds appropriately when asked nutrition-related questions.

steps.description: Log in to the platform.
Navigate to the chat interface with Pat AI.
Input a nutrition-related question, e.g., 'What are the benefits of protein?'
Verify that Pat AI returns a relevant and informative response within a reasonable time.

title: Pat AI Handles Invalid or Ambiguous Queries
description: Verify that Pat AI gracefully handles unclear, ambiguous, or nonsensical nutrition queries with appropriate messages.

steps.description: Access the AI chat interface.
Enter an ambiguous or invalid question, e.g., 'What is the color of nutrition?'
Confirm that Pat AI returns a polite clarification or error message indicating the query is unclear.

title: Meal Logging with Macro Calculation Using USDA Data
description: Test meal logging functionality using USDA data and verify automatic macro nutrient calculation is accurate.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the meal logging page.
Search for a meal item available in the USDA database.
Log the meal with specified quantity.
Verify that the system calculates and displays calories, proteins, fats, and carbohydrates correctly.

title: Meal Logging with Branded Product Data Source
description: Ensure that meal logging from branded product databases functions correctly and macros are calculated accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the meal logging section.
Search for a branded food product.
Log the product with appropriate portion size.
Check that macros and calorie values are correct according to product data.

title: Meal Logging with Gemini AI Data Source
description: Verify that Gemini AI generated meal entries provide accurate macro calculations when logged by the user.

steps.description: Access the meal logging page.
Add a meal suggested by the Gemini AI data source.
Confirm macros are calculated automatically and values align with typical nutrition standards.

title: Meal Logging Error Handling for Invalid Entries
description: Verify system behavior when user attempts to log incomplete or invalid meal data.

steps.description: Open meal logging interface.
Attempt to log a meal without selecting a valid food item or quantity.
Verify the system rejects the entry and shows an appropriate error message.

title: Calculate TDEE Based on User Profile
description: Validate that the Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) is correctly calculated based on user demographics and reported activity level.

steps.description: Log in and fill the user profile with necessary attributes (age, weight, height, gender, activity level).
Access TDEE calculation module or dashboard.
Verify that TDEE calculation uses the correct formula and that the result appears in the user interface accurately.

title: TDEE Calculation with Edge Case Inputs
description: Test TDEE calculation with extreme or boundary values for user parameters (very low/high weight, age, activity level).

steps.description: Create user profiles with extreme but valid input values.
Trigger TDEE calculation for each profile.
Confirm that the system handles edge cases gracefully and outputs reasonable TDEE values or warns if input is unrealistic.

title: User Dashboard Displays Health Metrics and Progress
description: Check that the personalized user dashboard shows relevant health metrics, meal logs, and progress visually and textually.

steps.description: Log in with a user account having meal logs and health data.
Navigate to the user dashboard.
Verify the display of daily meals, macro summaries, TDEE, and visual progress indicators.

title: User Dashboard Responsive Layout
description: Verify the dashboard UI is responsive and correctly displays on multiple screen sizes, including mobile and desktop.

steps.description: Access the dashboard on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Confirm that all elements are visible, well-aligned, and functional in each screen resolution.

title: Voice Integration Text-to-Speech Functionality
description: Test that the platform’s text-to-speech correctly vocalizes AI assistant responses across supported browsers.

steps.description: Access the Pat AI chat interface.
Input a query that triggers an AI response.
Activate the text-to-speech function.
Verify that the AI response is accurately vocalized without distortion or cutoffs across supported browsers.

title: Voice Input Functionality
description: Verify that users can submit queries to the Pat AI assistant via voice input and receive appropriate AI responses.

steps.description: Navigate to the AI chat interface.
Use voice input to ask a nutrition-related question.
Confirm the AI interprets voice input correctly and returns an accurate response.

title: Multi-Agent AI System Response Variation
description: Ensure different AI personalities and specialized agents in the multi-agent AI system respond appropriately and distinctly to queries.

steps.description: Submit the same nutrition question multiple times triggering different AI agents.
Verify that responses differ by tone or expertise based on the active AI agent personality.

title: Admin Panel User Role Management
description: Verify that admins can manage user roles (assign, modify, revoke) via the admin panel successfully.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user.
Navigate to the admin panel user management section.
Modify a user's role and save changes.
Confirm the user role updates correctly and permissions reflect the new role.

title: Admin Panel System Settings Management
description: Test that admin users can view and update system settings through the admin panel.

steps.description: Access admin panel settings section.
Change a configurable system parameter (e.g., AI response timeout).
Save the updated settings.
Verify that changes persist and affect system behavior as expected.

title: Trainer Features: Manage Multiple Clients
description: Validate that personal trainers can add, view, and manage multiple clients and their data.

steps.description: Log in as a trainer.
Navigate to the client management dashboard.
Add a new client with profile details.
Access and modify the client’s logged nutrition and health data.
Confirm that client data is saved and retrievable correctly.

title: Real-Time Chat Streaming Responses
description: Ensure streaming AI chat responses appear in real-time in the chat interface without delays or breaks.

steps.description: Access the AI chat interface.
Input a nutrition query that triggers a multi-sentence AI response.
Verify that the AI response displays incrementally and smoothly as it streams.
